comment:
* A full options object for grouping sizes.
 * @hide Only a subset of ICU is exposed in Android

variables.name: grouping1
variables.comment:
* The primary grouping size, with the following special values: *
    *
  • -1 = no grouping *
  • -2 = needs locale data *
  • -4 = fall back to Western grouping if not in locale *

variables.name: grouping2
variables.comment:
* The secondary grouping size, with the following special values: *
    *
  • -1 = no grouping *
  • -2 = needs locale data *
  • -4 = fall back to Western grouping if not in locale *

variables.name: minGrouping
variables.comment:
* The minimum grouping size, with the following special values: *
    *
  • -2 = needs locale data *
  • -3 = no less than 2 *

methods.name: public static Grouper forStrategy(GroupingStrategy grouping)
methods.comment: * Convert from the GroupingStrategy enum to a Grouper object.

methods.name: public static Grouper forProperties(DecimalFormatProperties properties)
methods.comment: * Resolve the values in Properties to a Grouper object.

methods.name: public static Grouper getInstance(short grouping1, short grouping2, short minGrouping)
public Grouper withLocaleData(ULocale locale, ParsedPatternInfo patternInfo)
public boolean groupAtPosition(int position, DecimalQuantity value)

methodNames: public static Grouper getInstance(short grouping1, short grouping2, short minGrouping)
